result.reason: The UI hangs because `ReadTerminalWindowTitle` synchronously calls `SendMessage` to the PuTTY window. If PuTTY blocks (e.g., waiting on pipe I/O or a modal dialog), `SendMessage` blocks the mRemoteNG UI thread.
result.approach: Implement `SendMessageTimeout` in `NativeMethods.cs` and use it in `PuttyBase.ReadTerminalWindowTitle` with a short timeout to prevent UI freezes. Also ensure the credential pipe thread is set to background.
